entry.title: DDD Series - 10 - Forbidden location
entry.summary: Oops! To use absolute images in an article, the article must have it’s own folder, use index.md as name. Because how HUGO generates the output, this simply can’t work. Use always an article-folder and index.md if you wan’t to use images with absolute paths!
